lesson.title: Building Scalable Search Infrastructure
lesson.summary: Search systems enable fast retrieval of relevant information from large datasets using indexing, ranking, and query processing techniques.
lesson.real_world_example: Elasticsearch powers search functionality for GitHub, enabling developers to quickly find code across millions of repositories
